businessProfile.name: Salerno's Pizzeria & Sports Bar
businessProfile.address: Western Suburbs, 9301 W 63rd St, Hodgkins, IL 60525, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: Western Suburbs, 9301 W 63rd St, Hodgkins, IL 60525, USA

reviews.text: Visited Saturday night and had a great experience! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, the staff were attentive and friendly, the food was absolutely delicious, and specifically the host, Allison, was so helpful. I asked Allison to seat me somewhere that wasn‚Äôt too close to the air conditioning as I get cold easily and she did exactly that. Loved her energy and willingness to seat me somewhere warm. Definitely a place I‚Äôll be coming back to!
Cool place with good food. Took awhile to get our drinks, appetizers came quickly but I had to find our server to request our drinks. Would go again though.

I didn't take pictures this time. I was in the moment. I ordered the Chicken Franchese and the lemon sauce was truly Delicious. My daughter and kids had the Chicken BLT ranch wrap with fries. It was their first time ordering it and all three said 10 out of 10 for taste. Our server was so kind and AMAZING. Definitely going back. You won't be disappointed.

I sat outside at the bar. No one else out there so I wasn‚Äôt expecting much service. Grace came out immediately and she checked on me by at least looking out to see if I needed anything. I had the best service today with her and I‚Äôve been coming here for 5 years. I had almost given up on this location. The service and food had not been consistent but today gave me hope. Grace was awesome. I had cheese curds and a deep dish pizza and cocktails. All were delicious. I hope I see Grace next time I return!!

The restaurant was ok and wait staff were great.   We came to see a cover band.  The event room was horrible - NO air conditioning - it was miserable.  Only one small box fan for a very small room.  And we paid $22 per ticket ahead of time through eventbrite.com.  When we arrived, they were only charging $10 cover to get in.  Never again.  Stay away.

editorial_summary.overview: Classic Italian dishes are offered at this casual family-friendly pizza & pasta specialist.

recentReviews.text:
Came her for dinner sept 13.  We had 4 people order the baked Sausage Paisano and all 4 were different.  One had a lot more sausage then another one, a different one had more vodka sauce than the other one is very inconsistent plating.  As for the combo appetizer platter, a half of the items were lukewarm at best. The others were warm. It is not something I would order again..

We also ordered a pizza and a burger to go both were good nothing great nothing that would make me say must return. I will come back, but I won‚Äôt go out of my way to visit.

Terrible service and terrible food. Waitress body language and look on her face as if she didn‚Äôt want to be there or serve my table. Bus boy takes plates and drinks away without asking if we‚Äôre done. Sauceless pizza, appetizers look like frozen food. First time eating there,  bad experience, I will never eat there again and highly don‚Äôt recommend this place to any other person.

My wife and I really enjoyed this place.
We were looking for pizza, and to watch college football. Well we found this place, and we definitely will be back.
We ordered MARGHERITA PIZZA, and the texture of the pizza was good, but no BASIL at all. We added two more toppings to it and was so expensive....... But we really like it.
My wife ordered ESPRESSO MARTINI, and it was not that bad.
I only ordered beer and was really cheap. 3dls bottle (Saturday).
We ended with the best TIRAMISU in a while!!!!!!!

Salernos really hit the spot today! I decided to try the jalape√±o burger and I am glad I did it was so good! Plus my server Veronica was so sweet and took really good care of me it made my experience so much better

This is my first time coming I came Thursday night to have dinner with a few friends, staff was so friendly and made us feel welcomed service was quick and food was amazing. Looking forward for my next visit! I recommend
So there is definitely a vibe. Its more of a family friendly vibe. The pizza was ok. The pizza came out hot.
First time visiting. Worth a second visit.
I absolutely loved the thin crust pizza I ordered and my server Veronica was amazing. So glad I decided to try this place.

The restaurant was ok and wait staff were great.   We came to see a cover band.  The event room was horrible - NO air conditioning - it was miserable.  Only one small box fan for a very small room.  And we paid $22 per ticket ahead of time through eventbrite.com.  When we arrived, they were only charging $10 cover to get in.  Never again.  Stay away.

Visited Saturday night and had a great experience! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, the staff were attentive and friendly, the food was absolutely delicious, and specifically the host, Allison, was so helpful. I asked Allison to seat me somewhere that wasn‚Äôt too close to the air conditioning as I get cold easily and she did exactly that. Loved her energy and willingness to seat me somewhere warm. Definitely a place I‚Äôll be coming back to!

As for the combo appetizer platter, a half of the items were lukewarm at best. The others were warm. It is not something I would order again..

We also ordered a pizza and a burger to go both were good nothing great nothing that would make me say must return. I will come back, but I won‚Äôt go out of my way to visit.

detailedReviews.text: This is my first time coming I came Thursday night to have dinner with a few friends, staff was so friendly and made us feel welcomed service was quick and food was amazing. Looking forward for my next visit! I recommend

detailedReviews.text: So there is definitely a vibe. Its more of a family friendly vibe. The pizza was ok. The pizza came out hot.

detailedReviews.text: First time visiting. Worth a second visit.

detailedReviews.author: Eduardo Reyes
detailedReviews.text: I absolutely loved the thin crust pizza I ordered and my server Veronica was amazing. So glad I decided to try this place.

detailedReviews.text: The restaurant was ok and wait staff were great.   We came to see a cover band.  The event room was horrible - NO air conditioning - it was miserable.  Only one small box fan for a very small room.  And we paid $22 per ticket ahead of time through eventbrite.com.  When we arrived, they were only charging $10 cover to get in.  Never again.  Stay away.

detailedReviews.author: Jenny F.
detailedReviews.text: Visited Saturday night and had a great experience! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, the staff were attentive and friendly, the food was absolutely delicious, and specifically the host, Allison, was so helpful. I asked Allison to seat me somewhere that wasn‚Äôt too close to the air conditioning as I get cold easily and she did exactly that. Loved her energy and willingness to seat me somewhere warm. Definitely a place I‚Äôll be coming back to!

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Corral
detailedReviews.text: The service was amazing the host Allison was the best she made me and my family feel so welcomed and made sure we were taken care of! I will definitely be coming back everything we ate was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Indy Espin
detailedReviews.text: The host was very sweet and proactive!!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Avelar
detailedReviews.text: I have always loved Salerno‚Äôs! I am obsessed with their baked sausage paisano and their chicken vesuvio. The girls that work there are so sweet and the host is always so welcoming. This is definitely my go to spot!

detailedReviews.author: Yasir Kanan
detailedReviews.text: Waitress  was so ignorant  and the host  was so disrespectful  they are both related and when i told the host she said that's my sister  next time don't come back who in the world tells that to a paying customer  especially  when your bill is 100 dollars  I will never come back and I will make sure I never refer any friends  and family to come here so disrespectful  and ignorant  very low class they need to fire the host ASAP

detailedReviews.author: Mike Jedlowski
detailedReviews.text: The backroom where the bands play is always hopping. They have different types of bands playing all types of music on the weekends.Never ate there so can't say anything about the food. P

detailedReviews.author: Gerald Werner
detailedReviews.text: Food was excellent,  service was slow and it was not crowded.

detailedReviews.author: slcalderon
detailedReviews.text: I didn't take pictures this time. I was in the moment. I ordered the Chicken Franchese and the lemon sauce was truly Delicious. My daughter and kids had the Chicken BLT ranch wrap with fries. It was their first time ordering it and all three said 10 out of 10 for taste. Our server was so kind and AMAZING. detailedReviews.text:
Do better.
get your urinals fixed in the men's bathroom

detailedReviews.author: Osbaldo JuareZ
detailedReviews.text: The calzone was great üëç

detailedReviews.author: Tony Castro
detailedReviews.text: Service and atmosphere is great! Food is Ok but not what it used to be.

detailedReviews.author: Jim Gabrys
detailedReviews.text: Great tasting pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Freyja Kendrick
detailedReviews.text: Burger was "funky", didn't eat it.  Fries were lukewarm,  Tuscan chicken panini was so-so.... and after waiting for over an hour,  pizza never came.  Horrible. Waiter was clueless,  but nice....I'll give him that. The woman behind the bar selflessly "took the pizza off the bill" (the one we never got) and was terribly rude. Never again.

detailedReviews.author: James Kucharski
detailedReviews.text:
I had their Buffalo wings. They were very good. However, their air-conditioning system was down due to a tornado that hit the region a couple weeks ago.

NOTE:  This location has CLOSED!

detailedReviews.author: Jenny Svoboda
detailedReviews.text: Clean, you feel welcomed, food is good & tasty , the staff is friendly

detailedReviews.author: mary palacios
detailedReviews.text: My service was perfect thank you,wish I remember the lovely latina that took care of us you were great

detailedReviews.author: mike s
detailedReviews.text: Always scared to order a chicken sandwich due to being over cooked.  Not here  the chicken was cooked perfectly.    They have a huge menu so shouldn‚Äôt have a problem finding something to eat.   Plenty of parking and staff was great. Was busy around 5 but we got seats.

detailedReviews.author: Angel Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: Not great service. Took forever to be greeted and the food took even longer to receive. Apps came at the same time as the rest of the food. Appetizer tasted like it sat in the window for a bit before they brought it. When they did no plates

detailedReviews.author: Tiffany Taylor
detailedReviews.text: I sat outside at the bar. No one else out there so I wasn‚Äôt expecting much service. Grace came out immediately and she checked on me by at least looking out to see if I needed anything. I had the best service today with her and I‚Äôve been coming here for 5 years. I had almost given up on this location. The service and food had not been consistent but today gave me hope. Grace was awesome. I had cheese curds and a deep dish pizza and cocktails. All were delicious. I hope I see Grace next time I return!!

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Wojtulewicz
detailedReviews.text: Young servers who are clueless.  Waited 10 minutes to be told by the manager someone would be with us soon...it wasn't even busy

detailedReviews.author: Frank Arena
detailedReviews.text: We went in for lunch. It wasn‚Äôt extremely busy but busy enough. Which tells me the food should be good. Let me tell you the service was awesome, the place was very clean and the pizza was to die for. It reminded me of the old Salerno‚Äôs. Management please continue to do what you‚Äôre doing. This was a great experience and we will see you soon. Also, they have a jumbo slice of pizza for six dollars that‚Äôs bigger than your face. Lol.

detailedReviews.author: Charlene Hefter
detailedReviews.text: This place has great cocktails and food. The staff is very friendly and does their best to go above and beyond+

detailedReviews.author: Edgar El Compadre
detailedReviews.text:
Appetizers sucked! cheese curds are from Ohio probably, t
he nachos just not good at all, the beer was fantastic. Great service tho

detailedReviews.author: John Barnicle
detailedReviews.text: Food and service both mediocre.  I notrd that a scrolling screen had information from 4 months ago and server said no one paid attentiin to it.  Nice enough place, but there is a reason it was empty.  I much prefer the one in Western Springs.

detailedReviews.author: David Marini
detailedReviews.text: Es una verg√ºenza,  figura q cierra a las 23 horas, hice 5 millas y llegue a las 22 horas, faltando 1 hora para el cierre y ya ten√≠an LA COCINA CERRADA...

detailedReviews.author: Lucy
detailedReviews.text:
Had to download Yelp for this one ‚Äì Salerno's was a disaster. We were the first ones in at opening and still waited over 90 minutes for our food (2 calzones, Margherita, Hawaiian no ham).
The Margherita arrived mostly raw. The Hawaiian first came with ham (we asked for none), and the remake was also undercooked. We were on a tight schedule after the ridiculous wait, so we asked for the raw Margherita off the bill ‚Äì no time for another remake. Then we asked for the bad Hawaiian off too.
The manager's response? "Our pizzas can't be undercooked, they're timed." Unbelievable. They still made us pay for the poorly made pizza. The server was okay, but the manager was nasty and wouldn't budge.
First and definitely last time at Salerno‚Äôs. Save yourself the trouble. Very disappointed

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Wasserman
detailedReviews.text: Clean establishment just watch the wine glasses

detailedReviews.author: Gilbert Lopez
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely TERRIBLE service. I called ahead to make sure they sold by the slice. Took a good 3 mins for aomeone to answer. I walk in.They have a sign that says DO NOT seat yourself. Stood there only to be greated 6 mins later. With multiple staff seeing me and saying nothing. Then am by a waitress that's curses about no pens in the front. And asks if I'd been helped. Only for her to walk away and say nothing else. Nor directed anyone to help me. Another waitress comes by and I ask if I could just order two slices. To which the other waitress comes by and says they have them but they've even there all day long. So I tell them I'll go else where. In which they had no reply. EXTREMELY unprofessional.

detailedReviews.author: Lorne Mann
detailedReviews.text: Cool place with good food. Took awhile to get our drinks, appetizers came quickly but I had to find our server to request our drinks. Would go again though.

detailedReviews.author: emmanuel gutierrez
detailedReviews.text: Went there after a session at the  range tried their dollar wings on Thursdays they were pretty good not the best but you know they were good.  My only complaint  is NEVER forget your credit card üí≥.  I had forgotten mine and the other day I called to see if it was there and instead of getting a yes or no answer they straight up accused me of being some one else that didn't pay their bill. They had me on hold and put me to a "manager" and even he was like weren't you the guy who didnt pay their tab. This was honestly pretty enfuriating because I had explained  to the first girl that picked up that they had me confused üòï. Why would I not pay and then go back for my credit card ????? Like where does that make any sense. To make it worse I was hungry and I contemplated getting something  to go but since I didn't even get an apology for the confusion  I went some where else.

detailedReviews.author: Valerie K
detailedReviews.text: Food not as good as I remember and looks a little worn down since the last time I was there which was several years. Waitress was great.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Novak
detailedReviews.text: It was hard to find (needed Uber to get there) once I got off the bus to the Quarry  shopping plaza

detailedReviews.author: Diane Blachuciak
detailedReviews.text: We went there for the first time , absolutely horrible we waited 45 mins after ordering drinks rude waitress rude management,  could not even here the band but we heard the drums . NEVER AGAIN !

detailedReviews.author: Ricardo Rivero
detailedReviews.text: Was there on a Tuesday night. The young man, Anthony was our waiter and is the reason I am writing this review. I'm 66 years old and he was hands down the best most attentive pleasant server I have ever encountered. The food was good but the level of service was truly outstanding, just can't say enough about the young man, a true gem!

detailedReviews.author: John Fitterer
detailedReviews.text:
Pretty decent pizza. Plenty of TVs all over the establishment. Not easy to get a channel changed to Cubs game when I was there, though.
Sound system in music area was just ok. Instruments sounded fine, but volume on vocals was way too low.

detailedReviews.author: Dan M
detailedReviews.text:
Went here to listen to a band
Paid good money for seat
People including workers standing in front of up all night . Horribly organized!!

detailedReviews.author: Brian Beran
detailedReviews.text: Went to see a live event here.  The bands were great and true professionals.  The sound system and technical difficulties were atrocious.  Ownership of Salerno‚Äôs, get your priorities straight and provide better services for your entertainment!!! Highly disappointed with this below subpar venue.

detailedReviews.author: t baird
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! I was there for a celebration of life party and the bartender was fast, nice and efficient. The party rooms are big and welcoming.

detailedReviews.author: Justin deG
detailedReviews.text: Supporting the infamous proud boys band trapt. Not a good look

detailedReviews.author: Sherry Anderson
detailedReviews.text: Well after months and months of avoiding this place we went and gave it another try tonight at 6:18 I ordered a half sausage half cheese double dough pizza. At 7:00 when it was ready after being told a half hour it would be ready we go and pick it up and it is a stuffed pizza with just cheese on it. We went inside asked for the manager he was like well maybe we have one in back did you want me to check? I was like well who's pizza is this then? He's like I have no idea? And just stood there looking at us like a dumb idiot that he is in my opinion .They are so incompetent at this restaurant it's unbelievable that they're still in business.See photo bathrooms are very dirty

detailedReviews.author: Lynne Dutton
detailedReviews.text: Went to the murder mystery dinner. Cannot express how WONDERFUL the staff of Salernos is. From the wait staff to the man who was checking us in, it was wonderful. The show was outstanding! I was so pleased with the food, it was amazing. We will be coming here for dinner often!!!

detailedReviews.author: DORY SI
detailedReviews.text: Great food and atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Marisela Guerrero
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food and good  drinks!!

detailedReviews.author: Carol Regalado
detailedReviews.text: All round fantastic family friendly place

detailedReviews.author: JULINDA C TRINIDAD
detailedReviews.text: Appetizer was a Sample..Pizza was Good.

detailedReviews.author: Maria Wagge
detailedReviews.text: I've been eating at Salernos since I was a kid. Haven't been to the Hodgkins location in a while and had a taste for Salernos pizza. Well at least the pizza I always remembered. First we ordered calamari. Absolutely horrible. We picked it up and the breading fell off and we couldn't even chew it. Sent it back. Sausage and peppers were horrible. Asked for bread. Got a piece of bread you would make a sub sandwich with. Couldn't cut it with knives we had because they were dirty.  If that wasn't bad enough when we got the pizza one look at it and I was disappointed. Definitely not homemade. Looked like a frozen pizza. No taste. I can get a better pizza at Little Ceasers. Service was horrible as well. Get the bill and I'm charged $1.40 for a hospitality fee. What??? I was charged for something I didn't even get. Will never go back!!! Worst $50 I ever spent. Salernos pizza is dead and gone. üò≠ They need to take the name off that place because it is definitely NOT SLAERNOS.

detailedReviews.author: Urzula Urzua
detailedReviews.text: Came for the band (Cadillac Groove), but food was very good too. Service was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Jo Ann Dining
detailedReviews.text: I'm a long time salerno's fan since I was a kid in Berwyn. I'm sorry to say the pizza experience was horrible. We were at the Hogkins location. The pizza we were served was DEFINITELY not the same pizza we had months ago. The crust was manufactured a perfect circle. Not house made. The sauce had absolutely no flavor. We drove over 30 minutes to be disappointed.  The server was sweet and when asked, she told us they recently changed the recipe. Bad move. Go to another location for the pizza we all know and love.

detailedReviews.author: Max C
detailedReviews.text:
I'm a single dude with social anxiety. I decided tonight I'd take myself out on a date, and with the Groupon I paid for, I was able to get $50 worth of food and drinks for $30.
The atmosphere is so nice. The lights are relatively dim, the chairs and tables are higher up, and the music is pretty good. You can also control what music plays if you use the touchtunes app.
The servers were very helpful! I was struggling to hit the $50 mark on my own, which I think is a good thing. I started off with a Salerno's Punch, which was a delicious alcoholic drink. It was fruity and sweet enough to very slightly mask the taste of the Bacardi, but without being overkill.
I had the pretzel sticks, which were so much bigger than I thought they'd be. The outside was slightly crispy and the inside was so fluffy and soft. The cheese sauce dip was perfect and had a subtle spice to it, which was delicious.
Next I had the whiskey pulled pork burger, which was the most incredible thing I'd ever seen. Who thinks to put pulled pork on top of a burger? That's so clever to me. I was starting to get full after a few bites, and I was still drinking my second drink. Even after 2 drinks, pretzels, and a burger with fries, I still hadn't hit my $50 mark. So, I decided to get dessert. They recommended the chocolate cake. I'm not usually a huge fan of chocolate cake, but I'm finishing it right now at home. It's delicious. The little chocolate curls on the side are such a good addition! I've included a photo.
All in all, my experience was incredible and the food was delicious. I'm glad I took myself on a date here :)

detailedReviews.author: Missy De La Rosa
detailedReviews.text: They should update their hours online if they are going to be closing earlier than usual!

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Cooke
detailedReviews.text: There for a funeral luncheon.

detailedReviews.author: arron barnes
detailedReviews.text: Spacious place, idea location for dining, event's,food was delicious wait staff hospitality awesome

detailedReviews.author: Tom Finley
detailedReviews.text: Stephanie is the hottest & best bartender this place has!!!

detailedReviews.author: Babe Conway
detailedReviews.text: Had the BEST waitress EVER Samatha was GREAT

detailedReviews.author: Red Red
detailedReviews.text: We attended the 2025 years party, and it was poorly structured. The seating chart was over crowded, some 60 year Olds got in to a fight by the bar and some where doing lines of cocaine in the bathroom. 2 sleazy old men where inside the womans rest room. The food was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Dancer Indy
detailedReviews.text:
-0 (Negative) Stars 12/07/24: Drove 40 minutes from the NW suburban area to be there for bands in back room -- Our table actually didn't get to order because of these issues caused by Salerno's
1) the table that my friend reserved was given away, and Salerno's knows to who, but would not accept the fault and retake the table and seat the party I was with (Salerno's gave it to a party that was with the opening band. Salerno's put out a table for us)
2) UNORGANIZED & UNSOPHISTICATED - Saturday night & during Christmas season & in proximity to a movie theater & other large retailers, but Salerno's was unprepared. 1 hostess, 1 backroom bartender, maybe 2 floor servers, 2 front bar bartenders (* will get back), and seemingly 2 or more servers & bartenders for what they consider a private party room (* will get back)
3) Greed & 1 focus - $; the service was focused on the dining room floor & the party in the party room adjacent to the music room
Salerno's divider of a private party room & the music room is what they believe are magic or soundproof curtains. The party was for someone turning 70. They might enjoy the music of Creed & Motley Cr√ºe, but they did not get a separate room because the curtains are merely dividers.
3.a) The manager placed menus on our table but sent nobody over to serve us--entire time

We never ordered and we had to go to the front bar for cocktails (* get back)
4) Front bar/Bartenders -- I AM A FORMER BARTENDER of the days when it was upstanding, had class, and the person knew how to mix cocktails, plus had a pleasant demeanor, AND had the training AND the WILLINGNESS, and knew laws about PROPER SERVICES TO EVERYONE  (* get back)
White Male, 50s, grey hair, short cut, 5'9 or 5'10 ignored me and went to EVERYONE else around me, and NEVER ACKNOWLEDGED ME NOR TOOK MY ORDER. THERE IS SOMETHING BIAS, PREJUDICIAL, OR DEFINITELY FISHY IN THAT
Female bartender, short, dark with dark features like Italian or Latina, 20s/30s, EVENTUALLY, stopped at me & took my order, PARTIALLY. I told her Miller Lite & a Coke. She heard the beer just fine, but I had to repeat COKE! 3 times to a near SHOUT! She became offended, but failed to accept that she is offensive & offended the customer, me, by having me shout. Her attempted "Prissy" arrogant rudeness PAID OFF FOR ME. She NEVER came back with the pop, BUT she NEVER charged me for the beer, either - SCORE 3 for ME, the customer. I waited & I have a witness who that "bar-person" also NEVER SERVED THE POP. I walked away
5) Back bar room: AWFUL! IT'S A PIT! mainly for service & customer-base. I do not mind a dive bar, when it suits its purpose & when I have made the choice to go. That Salerno's dresses it's fa√ßade as a middle scale restaurant, but it's a dump in a nice-looking building, from the outside. Eating at a dump is different than seeing a band and having a drink at a dive bar. I am pickier about food, but sometimes the best food comes from a seeming dump. I wouldn't know about Salerno's. We weren't served.  Changed my mind about eating there anyway
6) Back Bar Bartender, "Not!" No "Proper" bartender nor restaurant training or service training. They just put a male behind the bar
7) back bartender is worse than... ALL of them are equally bad, unskilled, untrained & bias, etc.
He works one end of the bar. He can't know what the other end of the bar would order because he doesn't get to that end, AND HE DOESN'T CARE. HE IGNORES FEMALES, & MAYBE THOSE NOT HIS TYPE.
-- SALERNO'S STEALS $ - I WATCH & SEE. KEPT EYE ON REGISTER FOR BARS STEALING BY NOT HAVING SET DRINK PRICES & KEEPING CUSTOMER CHANGE COIN & BILL. BARTENDER NEVER RETURN COIN IN THE CHANGE of CASH
- Near Closing: After allowing a separate drunk female & drunk male aggravate the band & he aggravated the female (FELL 3x) the bartender forced the older female with her female friend out the back door
- Bartender & 3 others tackled the skinny (30s?) male--LAWSUIT, & forced him out back door
Salerno's - OVER-SERVED, NON-ATTENTIVE TO CUSTOMER ACTION & BEHAVIOR, LACK OF CUSTOMER SERVICE & QUALITY etc.

detailedReviews.author: Maria Codamon
detailedReviews.text: The New Year's celebration was amazing!!! We started w their fabulous buffet. So good. A lil of everything italian. Chicken vesuvio, pastas, pizzas, and crispy chicken wings.The music was amazing. DJ Mixing Oliver and Rich Huerta were so good. The best new years eve party I've attended. I'll def be back next year and I'll invite my family and friends and reserve a table. Plus super affordable.

detailedReviews.author: Lola Cecilia
detailedReviews.text: Worse pizza ever!!! It tasted like they used tomato ketchup for the sauce!! Tasted horrible..Never buying pizza from there again. We bought a small Margarite pizza and a large Hawaiian pizza. Waste of money. Both pizza tasted horrible. Pizza dough is so plain... Tasted like a saltine cracker. The Hawaiian pizza sauce looked pink inside. Wth!!

detailedReviews.author: bee zic
detailedReviews.text: great place to meet friends.  love the üçï pizza

detailedReviews.author: Janet Donnini
detailedReviews.text:
Food was not made according to what menu said. Steak sandwich was supposed to have mushrooms and onion straws. They put lettuce, tomato, and pickle on it.
Specialty beef had barely any beef but had a pound of cheese and 4 pepper slices.
Garlic bread was bread with melted cheese.
Service was not great either. When you finish a drink, you would think they would ask if you want another, not just take the empty and walk away for over 10 minutes while you sit there.
Sad part, it was not even busy.

detailedReviews.author: Shelley F
detailedReviews.text: Just has gone down hill lately, waiting to be served sucks. No toilet seat in woman‚Äôs bathroom or paper dispenser to dry hands has been broke and missing for a lonnggg time . A lot of employees and nobody cares to take care of the guests. I‚Äôve never seen it this bad because I grew up celebrating with family at Salernos ! This has changed in the past few months, not the way I wanna spend my time or money

detailedReviews.author: Oscar Lopez
detailedReviews.text: I really didn't enjoy the pizza.....I felt the crust tasted more like cardboard. The pizza sauce tasted bland with a after taste. This is a sport bar environment.....

detailedReviews.author: Vickie Mendiola
detailedReviews.text: Why do I keep going there? Food... but service is terrible....

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer S
detailedReviews.text: Came in tonight to try them again after some bad service I experienced about 4 years ago. There were 4 other tables seated and about 4 or 5 young women workers. Clearly not busy. Nobody acknowledged us and after about 15 minutes of waiting and looking around, decided to leave. Amazing this place still remains in business.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.7/5 rating from 100 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the welcoming and attentive service, especially highlighting hosts like Allison and servers like Veronica, which significantly enhance their dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The atmosphere is described as warm, inviting, and family-friendly, creating a memorable dining experience that encourages repeat visits. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility

The food, particularly the pizza and specific dishes like the baked sausage paisano and Chicken Franchese, receives high praise for taste and quality. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent food quality and service issues - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and service delays - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: LCAmundo
positive.text:
My wife and I really enjoyed this place.
We were looking for pizza, and to watch college football. Well we found this place, and we definitely will be back.
We ordered MARGHERITA PIZZA, and the texture of the pizza was good, but no BASIL at all. We added two more toppings to it and was so expensive....... But we really like it.
My wife ordered ESPRESSO MARTINI, and it was not that bad.
I only ordered beer and was really cheap. 3dls bottle (Saturday).
We ended with the best TIRAMISU in a while!!!!!!!

positive.author: Zack Porsel
positive.text: Salernos really hit the spot today! I decided to try the jalape√±o burger and I am glad I did it was so good! Plus my server Veronica was so sweet and took really good care of me it made my experience so much better

positive.author: Vanessa L
positive.text: This is my first time coming I came Thursday night to have dinner with a few friends, staff was so friendly and made us feel welcomed service was quick and food was amazing. Looking forward for my next visit! I recommend

neutral.author: Carl Day
neutral.text:
Came her for dinner sept 13.  We had 4 people order the baked Sausage Paisano and all 4 were different.  One had a lot more sausage then another one, a different one had more vodka sauce than the other one is very inconsistent plating.  As for the combo appetizer platter, a half of the items were lukewarm at best. The others were warm. It is not something I would order again..

We also ordered a pizza and a burger to go both were good nothing great nothing that would make me say must return. I will come back, but I won‚Äôt go out of my way to visit.

neutral.author: Tony Castro
neutral.text: Service and atmosphere is great! Food is Ok but not what it used to be.

negative.author: roman lopez
negative.text: Terrible service and terrible food. Waitress body language and look on her face as if she didn‚Äôt want to be there or serve my table. Bus boy takes plates and drinks away without asking if we‚Äôre done. Sauceless pizza, appetizers look like frozen food. First time eating there,  bad experience, I will never eat there again and highly don‚Äôt recommend this place to any other person.

negative.author: Rich George
negative.text: The restaurant was ok and wait staff were great.   We came to see a cover band.  The event room was horrible - NO air conditioning - it was miserable.  Only one small box fan for a very small room.  And we paid $22 per ticket ahead of time through eventbrite.com.  When we arrived, they were only charging $10 cover to get in.  Never again.  Stay away.

negative.author: Yasir Kanan
negative.text: Waitress  was so ignorant  and the host  was so disrespectful  they are both related and when i told the host she said that's my sister  next time don't come back who in the world tells that to a paying customer  especially  when your bill is 100 dollars  I will never come back and I will make sure I never refer any friends  and family to come here so disrespectful  and ignorant  very low class they need to fire the host ASAP

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
